item.title: Blackhat Arsenal Tools
item.description: My take - @hackwithgithub is posting an updated list of GitHub repositories as they are uploaded based on the tools that are being featured in the Blackhat Arsenal. “Black Hat Arsenal USA 2017 On June 1, 2017 @toolswatch announced the tools selected for Black Hat Arsenal USA 2017. Most of the selected tools are already present on GitHub and some are yet to be uploaded. This article contains the links to their respective repositories.
